Replace.Text: Bai Zhouzi, your past experience can’t hide your brilliance. As the number one explosive damage type armor-piercing ADC in the whole game, your famous name is sung among the teachers. Cherish the bond with everyone in the tutoring department and overcome the difficulties ahead together!

Bai Zhouzi is a character that appears in the mobile game "blue archive". His identity in the game is a second-year student in the Holy Trinity (Trinity) comprehensive school, and he is also a member of the tutoring department.

The Tutoring Department is a special club established with the approval of the Tea Party, the highest governing body of the Holy Trinity. It is ostensibly to help students who fail the exam to take tutoring
In fact, he is borrowing the authority of the teacher to exclude the so-called traitors of the Holy Trinity in the signing process of the "Treaty of Eden"
Although Nagisa of the tea party (Nagi you do all kinds of bad things) made things difficult for the members of the tutoring club and planned to expel them from school
But the four people in the tutoring department still worked together to overcome the difficulties
And helped Nagisa crush the conspiracy from Arius' beheading operation
Don't be flirtatious! Don't be flirtatious! Don't be flirtatious! Don't be flirtatious! Don't be flirtatious! Don't be flirtatious! Don't be flirtatious! Don't be flirtatious!

Xiajiang Xiaochun is a character that appeared in the mobile game "Blue Archive". Its identity in the game is a first-year student in the Holy Trinity (Trinity) comprehensive school, and is also a member of the tutoring department. .

The Tutoring Department is a special club established with the approval of the Tea Party, the highest governing body of the Holy Trinity. It is ostensibly to help students who fail the exam to take tutoring
In fact, he is borrowing the authority of the teacher to exclude the so-called traitors of the Holy Trinity in the signing process of the "Treaty of Eden"
Although Nagisa of the tea party (Nagi you do all kinds of bad things) made things difficult for the members of the tutoring club and planned to expel them from school
But the four people in the tutoring department still worked together to overcome the difficulties
And helped Nagisa crush the conspiracy from Arius' beheading operation
So please give me your advice
(Ahhh, I don’t want to write about leader diplomacy, what do I write, you know it’s a declaration of refusal of friendship, that’s fine)
Want, with the teacher, to build a further relationship
Unexpectedly, an uncle like me would care about it, please give me your advice.
I understand. There is nothing interesting about me. Sorry if there was that expectation.
Really..., if you want to fight, then I will accompany you to the end.
It's time, you got a few minutes before my bullet goes through your head (declare war)
Didn't the teacher treat me like a child and coax me on purpose? ...Well, it doesn't matter if it is or not.
Sorry, I cannot accept your envoy dispatch for the time being.
Will you allow me to send an envoy to your capital.
......, I don't think we have anything to say between us
If it's all in vain, what are we living for..., yes, it's you, that arrogant guy over there (condemns you)

I am Bai Zhouzi. Recently, he just transferred to Holy Trinity Comprehensive Academy. What he is good at is acting alone. The advantage is that it is petite and easy to hide... probably so. Is there anything else you want to ask?
The headquarters of our tutoring department is in that direction.
Well, that would be great.
Can you provide us with the location of your capital city
Even if everything is meaningless, I think as long as there is a teacher around
...I understand. There is nothing interesting about me. Sorry if there was that expectation.
I think our relationship can go further
..., what are you trying to do with your troops deployed on the border of our school.
"Everything is nothingness, no matter where you go, everything is nothingness." Such a result, I am afraid it is also doomed
You are so kind and sweet.
The choice is yours.
So please give me your advice
Me, I don't intend to get acquainted with you.
Say yes first! Don't do nasty things!
(This, this unfolding, has been seen many times in the book...! Really, really going into that unfolding!?).
Eh?
Ah woo woo, I'm not afraid at all!
As a member of the justice committee, I can no longer sit idly by your perverted behavior! (declare war)
Say yes first! Something sour...? This, this kind of thing is not allowed! Once found, all will be confiscated! burn out!
Sorry, I cannot accept your envoy dispatch for the time being.
Will you allow me to send an envoy to your capital.
Me, I didn't say anything wrong! ?
You dirty, nasty pervert! (condemns you)
I am Xiajiang Xiaochun... Speaking of which, I have no plans to stay here for long...!
The headquarters of our tutoring department is in that direction.
Well, that would be great.
Can you provide us with the location of your capital city
Me, I don't intend to get acquainted with you.
If there is anything astringent, it will be confiscated.
Can we be allies?
..., what are you trying to do with your troops deployed on the border of our school.
Finally, I finally revealed my true nature, teacher...! ? (It’s not good, it’s not good, it’s not good...! I, I’m not ready yet!?)
You are so kind and sweet.
The choice is yours.
Koharu Shimoe
No, you can't be sensual!
There is a special regional justice committee that replaces the barracks. After the justice committee is built, a special project can be executed: Koharu's call
Azusa Shirasu
everything is empty

All cities -1 amenity, all cities' faith value output -10%, for each military policy in the slot, all units will have +1 combat strength, the holy land provides a cultural value equal to its adjacent bonus, and gains an additional military-political slot
No, you can't be sensual!
Koharu Shimoe

Xiaochun's characteristic unit, initially has 15 combat power, 2 attack range, each +10 combat power after researching archery and machinery, researches ballistics, each +20 combat power after advanced ballistics, has a unique upgrade tree, will be in the capital when defeated The remaining blood is revived, and the units within two ranges of Xiaochun are debuffed by Xiaochun's "charm", and the combat power is -5 [ICON_Strength]
Xiaochun's characteristic area, which replaces the barracks, can perform special projects: Xiaochun's call
